name: CoReSyFDataCubeMasking
description: This aggregates the masks of all slices in a data cube to one tow dimension mask and applie this to all slices.

inputs.name: source
inputs.description: Path to a netCDF data cube.

parameters.name: flags
parameters.description: Falgs to maskout data as a List.

parameters.name: mask_file
parameters.description: Set if aggregated mask should me exported as tif file.

outputs.name: target
outputs.description: Path to write masked data cube
